channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Europe’s largest company and AI play delivers on earnings but warns of China slowdown.
item.description: ASML’s 3Q earnings justify the optimism on the stock that saw its shares rally from a low of €597 in August to almost €900.

item.title: ‘It’s getting scary close to retirement’: We’re 70. We have no debt, no stocks and $275K in savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “We will have $4,300 a month in Social Security.”

item.title: ‘Expensive, but not nutty.’ Howard Marks on U.S. stocks and the one thing investors should be doing right now.
item.description: Oaktree co-founder Howard Marks says investors should start taking some “chips off the table,” after a strong run for markets.

item.title: My stepdaughter is buying a house. Can her soon-to-be ex-husband claim a share?
item.description: “Her real-estate agent has assured her that she has nothing to worry about.”

item.title: My father died leaving an old will predating his fourth wife. Who inherits his estate?
item.description: “He gave his fourth wife power of attorney and access to his bank account to pay bills.”

item.title: Buy Uber as ride-sharing giant primed for a big gain ahead, says Guggenheim
item.description: Uber Technologies shares have been on fire, and Guggenheim Securities thinks there are more gains to be had.

item.title: Home Depot has been in a steep downturn since mid-September. How to use options to bet on a bounce
item.description: Home Depot has been in a steady slide, down about 12% over the last 18 days.

item.title: Howard Marks celebrates 35 years of writing his acclaimed memos. He wasn't sure anyone read them at first
item.description: Marks' approach centers on reading the psychology of markets rather than forecasting them.

item.title: Wall Street can’t seem to shake off volatility. How to generate some safe returns into year-end
item.description: Here's where Wall Street is finding safety and income right now.

item.title: These are the support levels in QQQ ETF to look for as volatility picks up, according to the charts
item.description: Todd Gordon breaks down the technical levels he's watching on the QQQ.
